data.title: Auto 56 Theater
data.meta_description: The Auto 56 is New York State's most Northern drive-in movie theater. This family-friendly movie venue has been pleasing fans since 1955. They show double features all summer long on their gigantic movie screen. Patrons enjoy a full snack bar and reasonable movie ticket prices—fun for the whole fami
data.meta_site_name: ADK Taste - The Best of the Adirondacks
data.text:
Massena’s charming, old-fashioned solo screen “auto theater” has been delighting audiences in the North Country since 1955.

The 56 Auto Theater is the northernmost drive-in theater in the state of New York. If you're venturing any further north, you might want to pack your passport.

Starting late April and running through September, you can catch a double feature on their big screen every weekend. As the season heats up, they kick it into high gear and show movies every night, from when school lets out until Labor Day. So grab your popcorn, your family or your sweetie, and enjoy the magic of movies under the stars at The 56.

A localized FM radio broadcast provides movie audio. As of this writing, shows start at dusk (approx. 8:45 pm).

General Admission is $8, Lil’ ADKers 12 and under $4 and ages three and under FREE. Well-behaved dogs are also welcome. Check out their website for current showtimes and more information.

Don’t forget to visit the snack bar for hotdogs and hamburgers with all the toppings, fried dough, slushies, popcorn, candy, and so much more.
